body:
Always run Cython before `py-adios` installs. This makes sure the `.cpp` files from `.pyx` files are freshly created and work with newer CPython versions than the one checked in.

Related to #28003 (cc: @adamjstewart)

X-ref: https://github.com/ornladios/ADIOS/issues/216#issuecomment-999011323

Thanks @jychoi-hpc for the hint (I added you in the Spack package so you receive notifications about further updates).
title: Fix: py-adios Cython run
